korona aasadanaya wimath samanga athi wu niyumoniyawa, shwasana paddhathi akriya wim, penahalu pilika saha hruda rogi thaththwayan owun miyayamata hethu lesayi dakwenne.me athara, korona aasadanaya wimen miyagiya palamu polis niladhariya lesa wishrama yamata aasannawa siti monaragala mulasthana polisiyata anuyukthawa rajakari kala upa polis parikshakawarayeku miyagos athi bawa eeye wartha wuna. 59 hawiridi mema upa polis parikshakawaraya wishrama purwa niwadu laba siti ayeku bawayi polis madhya prakashaka niyojya polispathi ajith rohana sandahan kale.esema, korona ennath labadima aarambha kala pasugiya 29 wanada sita eeye dinaya dakwa kalaya thula pudgalayin eklaksha 67,762 denekuta ennath labadi athi bawa wasangatha roga widya anshaya pawasanawa.

magi bas gasthu sanshodhanaya pilibandawa jathika gamana gamana komishan sabhawa gasthu chakraya sakas keremin pawathina waga ema komishan sabhawe adhyaksha wipula hewawalimuni mahatha madhyawalata pawasa atha.bas gasthu prathipaththiya anuwa sama wasarakata warak juli masa 1 wanida gasthu sanshodhanaya siduwiya yuthu bawath in gasthu wadi ho aduwimata haki bawath disal mila, amathara kotas, sewaka watup , jala widuli bil, durakathana bil, pradhana karana 12 k padanam kara gena ema komishan sabhawa gasthu chakraya sakas karana athara ema warthawa prawahana amathya kumara welgama mahathage anumathiyata idiripath karana bawath wadiduratath sandahan we.me athara paudgalika bas himiyan ge sabhapathi hitapu (e. ja. pa.) palath sabha manthri gamunu wijerathna mahatha supurudu aakarayata magi janathawata sini bola kawime uthsahaya aarambha kara atha.bas gasthu sanshodhanaya kirimata awashya nathayi bas ratha dhawakayange sangamaya nikuth kala niwedanayaka sandahan kara thibuni.palasthara damimasama wasaraka ma juli 1 wanida bas gasthu sanshodhanaya wiya yuthu yayi shri lanka aandukrama wyawasthawe sandahan kara natha.

me sandaha nagarika sanwardhana adhikariyen¬† rupiyal laksha 15000k labadi thibe.me athara bhu widyathmakawa peradeniya nagaraye anarakshitha bawa pilibandawa pradeshawasin salakilimath wiya yuthu bawath, wasi bahulawa pawathina wita kanda udarata pradeshawala gaman biman yamedi nayayam pilibandawa prawesham wana lesath jathika godanangili paryeshana sanwidhanaye mahanuwara shakhawe bhu¬Æ widyagnya em.em.si.yu.bi.moremada mahatha pawasayi.peradeniya nagaraye ihala athi kanduyaye gilabasimak athi bawath kese wuwath thawaduratath bhu widyathmaka paryeshana pawathwa kande thaththwaya awabodha karagena eeta wisandum labadi peradeniya nagaraye anarakshitha bawa awama karana bawath moremada mahatha pawasayi.diwayine nuwaraeliya, mahanuwara, kagalla, rathnapuraya, mathale, badulla, kaluthara yana disthrikkawala nayayam lakshana bahula bawada ee pilibandawa ee pradeshawala padinchikaruwan awadhanaya yomu kala yuthu bawada bhu¬Æ widyagnya moremada mahatha pawasayi.mita amatharawa kolambaa, galla, mathara, hambanthota, monaragala, gampaha yana pradeshawalada nayayam lakshana athi bawada ee anuwa ee pradeshawalada adhika wasi pawathina wita salakilimath wiya yuthu bawada jathika godanangili paryeshana sanwidhanaya pawasayi.
